statement: Parents or carers of a preterm baby have an agreed discharge plan.
Parents or carers of a preterm baby who is eligible for enhanced developmental support, are provided with a single point of contact for outreach care within the neonatal service.
Children born preterm who are eligible for enhanced developmental surveillance have at least 2 follow-up appointments in the first year and an assessment at 2 years that focus on development.
Children born before 28+0 weeks' gestation have a developmental assessment at 4 years.
